pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predict Binding Between Peptides and MHC Molecules // Predicts binding of 9-to 12-mer peptides to MHC class I molecules using the stabilized matrix method. Can predict binding for several alleles from humans (HLA A/B), mice (H-2), chimpanzees (Patr A/B), and rhesus macaques (Mamu A/B).
